thread.section_title: South Florida Sports News - Sun Sentinel
thread.title: Miami Heat's Dwyane Wade, Chris Bosh longshots for NBA awards
thread.title_full: Miami Heat's Dwyane Wade, Chris Bosh longshots for NBA awards - Sun Sentinel

author: Ira Winderman
title: Miami Heat's Dwyane Wade, Chris Bosh longshots for NBA awards
text:
When it comes to the NBA's individual awards, the Heat stand as more of a longshot than in the league championship race. At least that's perspective according the lines posted by Bovada.lv.
The offshore book has Dwyane Wade as the highest-rated Heat player in its MVP odds, at 80-1, with Chris Bosh at 100-1.
In the race for Rookie of the Year, Justise Winslow has the seventh-best odds, with the Heat forward listed at 14-1.
As for projected league leaders, Bosh is listed at 50-1 to lead the NBA in scoring and Wade at 100-1. The odds are better for the Heat in the race for leading rebounder, with Hassan Whiteside listed at 11-1, tied for the fourth-best odds.
